thread.title: DataServ Selected by Einstein Noah Restaurant Group for Sales Revenue Reporting Automation
thread.title_full: DataServ Selected by Einstein Noah Restaurant Group for Sales Revenue Reporting Automation - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DataServ Selected by Einstein Noah Restaurant Group for Sales Revenue Reporting Automation
text:
DataServ today announced that Einstein Noah Restaurant Group, Inc. has chosen DataServ’s award-winning Quote: to Cash (Q2C) solution to automate and streamline a portion of their accounts receivable process.
St. Louis, MO (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
DataServ , a global Software as a Service (SaaS) provider of document and process automation solutions, today announced that Lakewood, Colorado-based Einstein Noah Restaurant Group, Inc., a leader in the fast-casual segment of the restaurant industry operating under the Einstein Bros® Bagels, Noah's New York Bagels®, and Manhattan Bagel® brands, has chosen DataServ’s award-winning Quote: to Cash (Q2C) solution to automate and streamline a portion of their accounts receivable (AR) process. Einstein Noah Restaurant Group will utilize the Sales Revenue Reporting Automation component of DataServ’s Q2C solution.
“We were seeking a more streamlined approach for our license or franchise locations to submit sales revenue, and we wanted to eliminate as many of the manual activities required to prepare and finalize revenue figures as possible,” says Audrey Lucas, Shared Services Director at Einstein Noah Restaurant Group. “We feel that DataServ’s Q2C solution will help us accomplish these goals by providing us with electronic receipt of sales figures so that we don’t have to scan and manually generate spreadsheets internally. This will save us a lot of time and money and allow us to move our AR professionals to higher value tasks.”
Adds DataServ Founder/CEO Jeff Haller: “The Sales Revenue Reporting Automation function of our Q2C solution is something we are very excited about, as it is designed for companies like Einstein Noah Restaurant Group that have license or franchise members who need an outlet to provide accurate and timely revenue figures for their individual store location. We believe that Einstein Noah Restaurant Group is a perfect fit for this component of our solution, and we are confident that they will realize positive results from utilizing it.”
About DataServ
DataServ is a global SaaS provider of document and process workflow automation solutions for the financial operations and human resources functions. A cloud computing pioneer, they developed the first commercially viable SaaS enterprise content management (ECM) in the world. Serving organizations worldwide since 1994, DataServ streamlines and lowers costs within Accounts Payable via their Purchase to Pay (P2P) solution set (including Expense Report Automation and Purchase Order Requisition Automation), Accounts Receivable with Quote: to Cash (Q2C), and Human Resources through Hire to Retire (H2R) by capturing documents and data and automating business processes.
